name: Time Leap Paradise SUPER LIVE! Encore Pack
detailed_description:
By purchasing this DLC, you can soup up Time Leap Paradise SUPER LIVE! with the following content:

-5 characters fully usable in both Solo and Group Dance mode
-A total of 9 available songs, plus remix versions
-20 unique outfits, with special variations for each character
-4 headgear options to choose from

Note:
-The songs available for both main vocalist and backup dancer selection vary for each character.
-Many outfits have unique character-specific designs
-For Komomo only, the Maid Outfit takes the place of the Casual Dress costume

Detailed information on the contents of the DLC can be found below.

[Main Vocalist]
・Ayumu
・Young Ayumu
・Yuu
・Haruka
・Komomo

[Backup Dancer]
・Ayumu
・Young Ayumu
・Yuu
・Haruka
・Komomo

[Songs]

■Ayumu
・Happy Leap
・Little My Star
・Kimi ni Futatabi Aeta Kiseki
・Sorauta
・Yukyuu no Tsubasa
・Gacha Gacha Cute Figu@mate
・Tori no Uta
・Little Busters!
・Happy Leap -Version NES26K86-
・Little My Star -More Shining Star Version-
・Sorauta -SIDE B-
・Kimi ni Futatabi Aeta Kiseki -.aif mix-

■Young Ayumu
・It's show time(※Solo Dance Only)
・Happy Leap
・Little My Star
・Kimi ni Futatabi Aeta Kiseki
・Sorauta
・Yukyuu no Tsubasa
・Gacha Gacha Cute Figu@mate
・Tori no Uta
・Little Busters!
・Happy Leap -Version NES26K86-
・Little My Star -More Shining Star Version-
・Sorauta -SIDE B-
・Kimi ni Futatabi Aeta Kiseki -.aif mix-

■Yuu
・Happy Leap
・Little My Star
・Kimi ni Futatabi Aeta Kiseki
・Yukyuu no Tsubasa
・Gacha Gacha Cute Figu@mate
・Tori no Uta
・Little Busters!
・Happy Leap -Version NES26K86-
・Little My Star -More Shining Star Version-
・Kimi ni Futatabi Aeta Kiseki -.aif mix-

■Haruka
・Happy Leap
・Kimi ni Futatabi Aeta Kiseki
・Sorauta
・Yukyuu no Tsubasa
・Gacha Gacha Cute Figu@mate
・Tori no Uta
・Little Busters!
・Happy Leap -Version NES26K86-
・Sorauta -SIDE B-
・Kimi ni Futatabi Aeta Kiseki -.aif mix-

■Komomo
・Happy Leap
・Little My Star
・Kimi ni Futatabi Aeta Kiseki
・Sorauta
・Gacha Gacha Cute Figu@mate
・Tori no Uta
・Little Busters!
・Happy Leap -Version NES26K86-
・Little My Star -More Shining Star Version-
・Sorauta -SIDE B-
・Kimi ni Futatabi Aeta Kiseki -.aif mix-

[Dance Costumes]
・Casual Dress
・Uniform

・ef Summer Outfit

short_description: This DLC adds extra characters, songs, and outfits to Time Leap Paradise SUPER LIVE!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimale :
  • Système d'exploitation : XP/Vista/7/8.1/10
  • Processeur : Intel Core 2 Duo equivalent or higher
  • Mémoire vive : 1536 MB de mémoire
  • Graphiques : NVIDIA Geforce7600 equivalent or higher
  • DirectX : Version 9.0c
  • Espace disque : 7 GB d'espace disque disponible
  • Carte son : Support for PCM playback
  • Notes supplémentaires : Pixel Shader 2.0 or higher (GeForce/Radeon)
